# Miscellaneous | Problem | Solution | |-------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **The camera is unresponsive.** | - **Temporary camera malfunction:** Remove and reinsert the battery (ðŸ“– 30).
- **The battery is exhausted:** Charge the battery or insert a fully-charged spare battery (ðŸ“– 33).
- **The camera is connected to a wireless LAN:** End the connection. | | **The camera does not function as expected.** | Remove and reinsert the battery (ðŸ“– 30). If the problem persists, contact your Fujifilm dealer. | | **Motion in the viewfinder or monitor appears jerky rather than smooth.** | When **NORMAL** is selected for **PERFORMANCE**, the frame rate will drop if no operations are performed for a set period. The normal frame rate will be restored after you operate camera controls (ðŸ“– 233). | | **No sound.** | - Adjust the volume (ðŸ“– 213).
- **OFF** is selected for **SOUND & FLASH:** Select **ON** (ðŸ“– 211). | | **Pressing the Q button does not display the quick menu.** | **TTL-LOCK is active:** End TTL-LOCK (ðŸ“– 150). |

rows:
- **Temporary camera malfunction:** Remove and reinsert the battery (ðŸ“– 30).
- **The battery is exhausted:** Charge the battery or insert a fully-charged spare battery (ðŸ“– 33).
- **The camera is connected to a wireless LAN:** End the connection.
**The camera does not function as expected.**
Remove and reinsert the battery (ðŸ“– 30). If the problem persists, contact your Fujifilm dealer.
**Motion in the viewfinder or monitor appears jerky rather than smooth.**

When **NORMAL** is selected for **PERFORMANCE**, the frame rate will drop if no operations are performed for a set period. The normal frame rate will be restored after you operate camera controls (ðŸ“– 233).

- Adjust the volume (ðŸ“– 213).
- **OFF** is selected for **SOUND & FLASH:** Select **ON** (ðŸ“– 211).
**Pressing the Q button does not display the quick menu.**
